name: Chatsimple Inc.
description: Developer of an artificial intelligence chatbot platform designed to provide sales support for businesses. The company's platform offers lead generation, qualification and conversion, artificial intelligence customer support and sales with access to different language barriers, enabling businesses to do their marketing and social broadcasting properly.
